Method Detail

insert

public Buzz.Comments.Insert insert(String userId,
                                   String postId,
                                   Comment content)
Create a request for the method "comments.insert". This request holds the parameters needed by the the buzz server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Buzz.Comments.Insert.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
userId - ID of the user on whose behalf to comment.
postId - ID of the activity on which to comment.
content - the Comment
Returns:
the request

get

public Buzz.Comments.Get get(String userId,
                             String postId,
                             String commentId)
Create a request for the method "comments.get". This request holds the parameters needed by the the buzz server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Buzz.Comments.Get.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
userId - ID of the user being referenced.
postId - ID of the activity for which to get comments.
commentId - ID of the comment being referenced.
Returns:
the request

list

public Buzz.Comments.List list(String userId,
                               String scope,
                               String postId)
Create a request for the method "comments.list". This request holds the parameters needed by the the buzz server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Buzz.Comments.List.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
userId - ID of the user for whose post to get comments.
scope - The collection to which the activity belongs.
postId - ID of the activity for which to get comments.
Returns:
the request

update

public Buzz.Comments.Update update(String userId,
                                   String scope,
                                   String postId,
                                   String commentId,
                                   Comment content)
Create a request for the method "comments.update". This request holds the parameters needed by the the buzz server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Buzz.Comments.Update.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
userId - ID of the user being referenced.
scope - The collection to which the activity belongs.
postId - ID of the activity for which to update the comment.
commentId - ID of the comment being referenced.
content - the Comment
Returns:
the request

delete

public Buzz.Comments.Delete delete(String userId,
                                   String postId,
                                   String commentId)
Create a request for the method "comments.delete". This request holds the parameters needed by the the buzz server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Buzz.Comments.Delete.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
userId - ID of the user being referenced.
postId - ID of the activity for which to delete the comment.
commentId - ID of the comment being referenced.
Returns:
the request
